A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Love everything there is about Star Wars and am even a fan of the Trilogy no one really likes. But The Last Jedi needed more build! The entire time I felt in the same place when I wanted to be taken for a ride. Regardless\, Awesome\, Beautiful and Intoxicating. It definitley pulled me more into the series and am looking forward for the rest of the story! Never forget Carrie Fisher
